about_the_game:
Global conspiracies, ancient and nightmarish beings, crime-laden cities, seductive yet deadly characters. This is the world of MoonFall, where cyberpunk meets cosmic horror, and where the encroaching apocalypse comes in several different flavors.

This book is meant to be supplemental material that expands on the in-game lore for the A Memory of Eternity series. Written in-universe by Raguel Drusus, Assistant Curator of the Infinite Library, MoonFall: A Lore Book covers the essential topics, global powers and the dramatis personae that can be found in MoonFall.

This lorebook does include [Redacted] sections as a stylistic choice and as an homage to other fictional works such as the SCP Foundation.

What is included in the book?


A 120+ page, full-color lore book available for digital download as a PDF file.
